original: Blidberg, Björn Allan David, skeppsmäklare, Göteborg, f. 11/12/95 i Gbg av skeppsmäkl. David B. o. Augusta Pedersen. G. 22 m. Nancy Crowley. Barn: Vicki f. 27. — Ex. fr. Gbgs hand:inst. 14. Fänrik i trängen 17, kapt. i res. 40. Anst. h.
translated: Blidberg, Björn Allan David, shipbroker, Gothenburg, b. 11/12/95 in Gothenburg to shipbroker David B. and Augusta Pedersen. Married on 22/xx to Nancy Crowley. Children: Vicki b. 1927. Graduated from Gothenburg Commercial Institute in 1914. Enlisted as a second lieutenant in the Logistics Corps in 1917, promoted to captain in the reserves in 1940. Employed at h. (unknown abbreviation).
